price: 3. Soki ezalaka elaka oyo Allah akomela bango te, mbele topesaki bango etumbu ya makasi na mokili, mpe o mokolo ya suka bakozalaka na etumbu ya moto.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡجَلَآءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابُ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walawlā an kataba al-lahu ʿalayhimu al-jalāa laʿadhabahum fī al-dun'yā walahum fī al-ākhirati ʿadhābu al-nāri
